sentences.sContent: He passed himself off as a senior psychologist.
sentences.sCn: 他自己冒充是一名资深心理学家。

sentences.sContent: I've tried to pass off my accent as a New York one.
sentences.sCn: 我试图把我的口音冒充为纽约口音。

trans.tranOther: If you pass something off as another thing, you convince people that it is that other thing
